projects.name: Youtube Clone
projects.description: A Youtube Clone built using React.JS and Material UI. Used external API to fetch data and is Fully Responsive, has Infinite Scroll capabiility.

projects.name: Ecommerce Website
projects.description: A Website that is implemented using React.JS. It is fully responsive and added with Add,Delete and Update operations.

projects.name: Dice Game
projects.description: A Game that is developed using React.JS . That generates a random dice image and if the number is same as the preselected number it awards points if it is not same the game reduces the existing points.

projects.name: Contact App
projects.description: A Contact Website that is developed using React.JS and also uses Firebase as Database. It is used to store Name and Contact Details .

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: A Portfolio Website that is developed using React.JS . It displays all My Interests,Qualification,Skills,Projects,Resume and also enables to Contact me through Email and also through Social Media Handles.
